column6:
The HULK roars into action, drawn by HULK superstar ED MCGUINNESS! But this is a Hulk the likes of which you have never seen before...trust us, True Believer! Plus-MACHINE MAN battles his past, WEAPON OMEGA battles himself, and VANGUARD battles everybody!,2008,5
Rated T+...$3.99
